# <a name="how-to-view-outlookcom-message-headers-or-message-source"></a><span data-ttu-id="56fee-102">如何查看 Outlook.com 邮件头或邮件源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56fee-102">How to view Outlook.com message headers or message source</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56fee-103">若要查看电子邮件中的标题和其他详细信息, 请选择三个点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56fee-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="56fee-104">阅读窗格的右上角, 然后选择 "**查看邮件源**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56fee-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
